item.title: STAT 385 Midterm Review
item.description: This semester in Stat 385: Statistics Programming Methods I have learned a fair amount of technical skills. Although I entered this class fairly experienced with R, I have learned quite a few R techniques that I was unfimiliar with previously, as well as learning how to use Github and R blogdown. R Functions and Techniques Listed below are a few functions that before entering this course I had either only used sparingly or hadnâ€™t used at all.
